resources.string: What should I put in the box?
Where can I leave the box?
Access to the location service is required to demonstrate the \'My location\' feature, which shows your current location on the map.

This app requires location permission to enable the \'My location\' layer. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > \'Google Maps API Demos\'.
Location permission is required for this app.
